content.raw: This pull request changes SDF by moving the noise into separate x,y,z elements. Normally we would have to create a new version of SDF (1.6 in this case). I believe we will be okay with pushing this into default because no Gazebo code used the sensor, sdf will now ignore any noise parameters in the wrong location.
content.html: This pull request changes SDF by moving the noise into separate x,y,z elements. Normally we would have to create a new version of SDF (1.6 in this case). I believe we will be okay with pushing this into default because no Gazebo code used the sensor, sdf will now ignore any noise parameters in the wrong location.
